author: Emma Chapman
excerpt: The A Beautiful Mess podcast gears up for a new season and asks listeners to weigh in on ideas for upcoming episodes and segments.
text: Thanks so much for listening to and supporting our podcast! If you heard the latest episode then you know we are gearing up for a new season in mid August 2024. Weâ€™ll be putting out new episodes every week for the rest of the year and making a few small improvements along the way. (We will still have random episodes here and there until thenâ€”donâ€™t worry!) With this in mind, we want to hear from you! Please fill out the survey below to support our podcast and help us improve the show. Some things to keep in mind that we are looking for in the open ended questions: movie suggestions for comfort rewatch episodes, stories you want to hear, and deep dive subjects. Thank you in advance. ðŸ™‚
html:
Thanks so much for listening to and supporting our podcast! If you heard the latest episode then you know we are gearing up for a new season in mid August 2024. Weâ€™ll be putting out new episodes every week for the rest of the year and making a few small improvements along the way. (We will still have random episodes here and there until thenâ€”donâ€™t worry!)

With this in mind, we want to hear from you! Please fill out the survey below to support our podcast and help us improve the show. Some things to keep in mind that we are looking for in the open ended questions: movie suggestions for comfort rewatch episodes, stories you want to hear, and deep dive subjects. Thank you in advance. ðŸ™‚
